title: I ropuina zawng zawng hmu turin
lyrics:
I ropuina zawng zawng hmu turin,
Ka mit min tihmensak ang che,
Tangka leh rangkachak ai pawhin,
Ka tan chu chu a tha zawk e,
Khawvel leh sum zawng zawng a ral ang,
Ka Pathian thu a ral lo vang;
Chatuana nunna min hriattir a,
Pathian leh Mihring - Lal Isua.
